definitions.definition: An offer at an auction , or to carry out a piece of work.
examples: The company tendered a bid for a lucrative transport contract.

definitions.definition: A (failed) attempt to receive or intercept a pass .
An attempt , effort , or pursuit (of a goal).
examples: Their efforts represented a sincere bid for success.
She put in her bid for the presidency.
He put in his bid for office.

definitions.definition: A particular route that a driver regularly takes from their domicile .

main_definition: An offer at an auction , or to carry out a piece of work.
secondary_definitions: ( ultimate frisbee ) A (failed) attempt to receive or intercept a pass .
An attempt , effort , or pursuit (of a goal).
( trucking ) A particular route that a driver regularly takes from their domicile .
